author: crafterm
msg: * Updated Model to support shorthands at the Role reference object level
(as well as in the Definition class for component selector hints).
* Fixed REVISIT for ComponentSelector generation in ECM module serialization.
* Fixed ECM module serialization bug for ComponentSelectors (thanks testcase! :) )

* Added a new ECMTestRig utility class which lets the testcase class use itself

author: proyal
msg: If current logger is additive and creating new child,
make it additive too (otherwise you won't get any log messages)
